Hero.title: Stress-Free Moving
Hero.subtitle: To Your New Home
Hero.desc: Professional, fast, and reliable. We handle your move, transport, or clearance – stress-free and at a fair price.

ServiceCards.subtitle: Our Services
ServiceCards.title: We Handle It All
ServiceCards.desc: Whether a single apartment or a large office – we offer tailored solutions for every need.
ServiceCards.privateDesc: Complete service for your move. From planning to assembly.
ServiceCards.officeDesc: Efficient office moves with minimal downtime for your business.
ServiceCards.clearanceDesc: We clear apartments, attics, and more – quickly and broom-clean.
ServiceCards.cellarDesc: Professional clearing and disposal of bulk waste from cellars and garages.
ServiceCards.transportDesc: Safe transport of individual furniture pieces or entire setups.
ServiceCards.packingDesc: Professional packing and unpacking service and provision of moving boxes.

Features.title: Your Benefits
Features.subtitle: Why We Are the Right Partner
Features.transparencyDesc: Clear communication and open advice from the start.
Features.insuranceDesc: All-round protection for your furniture and valuables during transport.
Features.teamDesc: Trained professionals who work carefully and efficiently.

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.subtitle: Everything you need to know.
FAQ.a2: Yes, we supply high-quality packaging material.
FAQ.q3: How much does a viewing cost?
FAQ.a3: The on-site viewing is usually free of charge.
FAQ.a4: Of course. Our team handles disassembly and assembly.

Footer.about: We bring you safely to your new home.

Pricing.infoReq: For a quote we need: Start/End Zip, Floor, Elevator, Date.

QuoteFormFull.successMsg: We have received your data and will create your quote. You will hear from us shortly.

ContactPage.title: Contact Us
ContactPage.subtitle: We are here for you
ContactPage.phoneDesc: Call us – we are happy to advise you directly.

ServicesPage.title: Our Services
ServicesPage.desc: We offer a complete package for your needs. Choose the service that suits you.
ServicesPage.customDesc: Every move is unique. If you consider a service not listed, contact us. We will find a solution.

reqList: Transport only or styling help needed?
